scripts.pretest: rimraf tests-out && rimraf screenshots && tsc --incremental -p tests/tsconfig.json
scripts.test:webserve:bitwarden: cd clients/apps/web && ENV=cloud npm run build:oss:watch
scripts.setup:clients: rimraf clients && git clone https://github.com/bitwarden/clients.git clients && cd clients && npm ci
scripts.seed:vault:refresh: ./vault-seeder/bw-serve-helper.sh && REFRESH=true ts-node ./vault-seeder/vault-seeder.ts && kill $(ps -e | grep 'bw serve' | awk '{print $1}')
scripts.build:clients: cd clients/apps/browser && rimraf build && npm run build
scripts.build:clients:prod: cd clients/apps/browser && rimraf build && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:clients:mv3: cd clients/apps/browser && rimraf build && npm run build:mv3
scripts.build:clients:autofill: cd clients/apps/browser && rimraf build && cross-env AUTOFILL_VERSION=2 npm run build
scripts.build:clients:autofill:mv3: cd clients/apps/browser && rimraf build && cross-env AUTOFILL_VERSION=2 MANIFEST_VERSION=3 npm run build
